Name: Disk with Geometric Pattern
Description: This disk has one flat side and one slightly convex side. The convex side is decorated with geometric patterns in black, white, and brown. Other decorated spinning disks like this one were found in an open wooden box in Hemaka's tomb. They were apparently intended for use as small spinning tops. A stick was inserted in the hole through the center of the disk. When the disk is turned, wonderful designs can be seen.
